description: Explore, query, and inspect SQLite databases with ease. List tables, preview results, and view detailed schema metadata to understand structure quickly. Verify connectivity and readiness with a quick health check.

capabilities.name: read_query
capabilities.description:
Execute a query on the SQLite database.

Args:
    query: SELECT SQL query to execute
    params: Optional list of parameters for the query
    fetch_all: If True, fetches all results. If False, fetches one row.
    row_limit: Maximum number of rows to return (default 1000)

Returns:
    List of dictionaries containing the query results

capabilities.name: list_tables
capabilities.description:
List all tables in the SQLite database.

Returns:
    List of table names in the database

capabilities.name: describe_table
capabilities.description:
Get detailed information about a table's schema.

Args:
    table_name: Name of the table to describe

Returns:
    List of dictionaries containing column information:
    - name: Column name
    - type: Column data type
    - notnull: Whether the column can contain NULL values
    - dflt_value: Default value for the column
    - pk: Whether the column is part of the primary key

capabilities.name: health_check
capabilities.description: Check if the server and database are working properly.
